createInClickUp.title: ENHANCEMENT: Admin View of Employee Profiles
createInClickUp.userStory: As an admin I want a consolidated admin-only view of employee profiles so I can quickly review status, assignments, and compliance.
acceptanceCriteria: Access restricted to Admin or above.
Admin can view any employee's profile with core fields (name, role, company, status).
Admin view displays assigned equipment and latest training/compliance status.
Admin view links to audit log entries related to the employee.

createInClickUp.title: Provide Cost Estimate: Equipment Maintenance/Warranty Service Project
createInClickUp.userStory: As a product owner I want a clear cost estimate for the equipment maintenance & warranty service project so that I can scope budget and timeline.
acceptanceCriteria: Assumptions and out-of-scope explicitly listed.
Delivery risks and dependencies identified.
Estimate broken down by epics (Requests, PO, Provider Portal, Logs, Reports).
Includes points, hours, and lead roles per epic.

createInClickUp.title: FUW: Leslie to Coordinate Adding Equipment to System
createInClickUp.userStory: As a coordinator I want Leslie to work with staff to add equipment so that seed data exists for acceptance testing.
acceptanceCriteria: Blocker reason recorded and updated when unblocked.
Each item has owner/company, status, and unique asset identifier.
Initial equipment list imported or entered (min 20 records).
Sample assignments created for at least 3 employees.

createInClickUp.title: Admin: Maintenance Request PO Approval & Management
createInClickUp.userStory: As an admin I want to triage and approve maintenance requests and generate POs so that work can be scheduled and tracked.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can approve, deny, or request more info.
Admin can comment on requests for clarification or instructions.
Admin can edit P.O. details (vendor, expected cost, due date).
Admin can schedule work (assign vendor or in-house).
Admin is notified of new maintenance requests.
Approved requests generate a unique P.O. number automatically.
Reports by P.O. status (pending, approved, scheduled, completed).
System tracks full history of approvals, denials, edits, and status changes.

createInClickUp.title: DECISION: Auto-add Assigned Equipment to Jobsites?
createInClickUp.userStory: As a team we need a decision on whether employee-assigned equipment should be auto-added to their jobsite so that visibility rules remain consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: Decision documented with pros/cons.
If 'No', rationale captured and edge-cases addressed.
If 'Yes', rules and automation steps defined.

createInClickUp.title: DECISION: Define Equipment Manager Role
createInClickUp.userStory: As a team we need clarity whether Equipment Manager is a distinct role so that RBAC can be implemented cleanly.
acceptanceCriteria: Affected screens and API permissions updated.
If confirmed, permissions added to Rights & Roles matrix.
Role existence confirmed or rejected.

createInClickUp.title: DECISION: Are Providers Their Own Employee Type?
createInClickUp.userStory: As a team we must decide whether providers are modeled as employees or separate entities to simplify permissions and data modeling.
acceptanceCriteria: Data model choice recorded with justification.
Migration plan (if needed) captured.
RBAC implications documented.

createInClickUp.title: Equipment Status Field
createInClickUp.userStory: As an admin I want equipment to have a status so that lifecycle and availability are clear.
acceptanceCriteria: Filters support status values across lists and reports.
Status editable by Admin/Equipment Manager.
Status field added (e.g., Active, In Maintenance, Retired).

createInClickUp.title: Refactor Mileage Tracking to Dedicated Report
createInClickUp.userStory: As a developer I want mileage tracking moved from the equipment table into a dedicated report so that performance and history are improved.
acceptanceCriteria: Equipment table no longer stores aggregated mileage directly.
Mileage history preserved and queryable (not just sum).
Mileage log exists with date/time and miles entries.
Users can enter mileage into the log (date/time, miles).

createInClickUp.title: GPS Mileage Tracking Identity Strategy
createInClickUp.userStory: As a systems architect I want to decide whether mileage is tracked by VIN or device ID so that data integrity is maximized.
acceptanceCriteria: Backfill/migration approach documented.
Identity source (VIN or device) selected with rationale.
Mapping rules defined for device swaps and multi-device scenarios.

createInClickUp.title: Employee Access to Equipment Files
createInClickUp.userStory: As an employee I want to see files attached to my assigned equipment so that I can access manuals and documentation.
acceptanceCriteria: Access controls enforced server-side.
Audit log includes file view events.
Employees can view files attached to equipment they are assigned to.

createInClickUp.title: (DEFERRED) JobNimbus Integration
createInClickUp.userStory: As an admin I want a JobNimbus integration so CRM/job data can sync with our system.
acceptanceCriteria: Add Company Locations table (with hours optional).
Add Lead Source fields where specified.
Add ManagerId to Employees.
Add SalesRep to Jobs table.
Add address line 2.
Add project manager to employee type.
Contact table includes standard info, Contact Type, Status, Sales Rep, Lead Source, assigned to, related contacts.
Field mappings and validation documented.
Job table updates: JobType, Status, Lead Source, Tags, Type of Loss, Insurance Company, related Contacts, Class (reference JobNimbus), job photo, Date of Loss.
Rename Employees to Team (or map accordingly).
Sync jobs, contacts, and companies with conflict resolution.

createInClickUp.title: Update Rights & Roles Matrix & Notify Brent
createInClickUp.userStory: As a PM I want the updated matrix communicated so stakeholders are aligned.
acceptanceCriteria: Follow-up Q&A captured in notes.
Matrix updated in documentation repo.
Summary sent to Brent with key changes.

createInClickUp.title: P.O. System Core
createInClickUp.userStory: As a user I want to create, edit, view, and remove Purchase Orders so procurement can be managed.
acceptanceCriteria: Files can be attached to a P.O.
Users are notified of relevant P.O. changes based on access.
Users can create, edit, view, and remove POs (per role permissions).

createInClickUp.title: Comments & Notes (Equipment, Requests, etc.)
createInClickUp.userStory: As a user I want threaded comments with notifications so collaboration stays in context.
acceptanceCriteria: Notification deep link opens the relevant entity view.
Notifications on replies are sent to participants.
Users can reply to a comment (threaded).
